25.ara-name: كتاب الأطعمة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibrahim bin 'Umar bin Safinah: From his father, from his grandfather that he said: "I ate bustard meat with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Gharib, we do not know of it except from this route. Ibn Abi Fudaik reported from Ibrahim bin 'Umar bin Safinah and he has been called Buraih bin 'Umar bin Safinah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي أَكْلِ الْحُبَارَى
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Eating Bustard
